description: Rows of a magic square of order 3.
comments: Of course there are a large number of ways to convert this (unique) magic square to a sequence by reading it by rows, so the sequence is hardly unique. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 29 2002This magic square is referred to Loh-Shu magic square and is attributed to the legendary Fu Xi (Fuh-Hi).
links: Index entries for sequences related to magic squares
author: Olivier Gorin (gorin(AT)roazhon.inra.fr)
